byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and RICK GLADSTONE

snippet: Along with a furious formal rejection of American accusations of a plot to murder a Saudi ambassador, Iran offers predictions that American capitalism will fall.
lead_paragraph: Along with a furious formal rejection of American accusations of a plot to murder a Saudi ambassador, Iran offers predictions that American capitalism will fall.

headline.main: Iran Sees Terror Plot Accusation as Diversion From Wall Street Protests
headline.print_headline: Iran Sees Terror Plot Accusation as Diversion From Wall Street Protests
